Class ComunicatorIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ComunicatorIO

  • public class ComunicatorIO
extends java.lang.Object
    class ComunicatorIO. This class is responsible for storing vehicle and task data in files in a local folder called "data". Everytime the application starts thic class is going to provide the stored data. And when the application is closed it's going to store the data in different files for every vehicle an one file for upcomming tasks.
    Version:
    2017/11/13
    Author:
    Aleksandar Dimeski
